channel.title: Exorus | OSRS | Zulrah | Achievements | Iron Man | 20 + Bosses | New Server
channel.description:
[CENTER] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/8tDexkf.png[/img]
[COLOR="#FFFFFF"][SIZE=3]Links[/SIZE][/COLOR]
[URL=http://"http://exorus.org/"]Forums[/URL] [URL=http://"http://exorus.org/client/Exorus.jar"]Play Now (Download Client)[/URL] [URL=http://"http://exorus.org/vote"]Vote[/URL]
[COLOR="#FFFFFF"][SIZE=3]Short Intro[/SIZE][/COLOR]
Exorus is a oldschool based server with loads of content such as all working skills, 20 + bosses to kill, iron man mode for people who like the challenge. Exorus also has a completionist cape with a total of 17 Hard tasks to complete with more tasks being added frequently. Exorus is not a easy server that you can max out right away the xp rates are set at a perfect not to easy not to hard level so players do not get bored from either taking to long or being too fast.
[COLOR="#FFFFFF"][SIZE=3]Some Notable Features[/SIZE][/COLOR]
Iron man mode Completionist cape Clue scrolls Quick Prayers Osrs Items PvP Venom Boss Pets Zulrah 20 + Bosses Custom home Auto Vote IPB Forums All skills working Hard but not to hard xp rates Hard but not to hard Economy Duel Arena Pest Control Bank Tabs Custom Slayer rewards
And lots more
[COLOR="#FFFFFF"][SIZE=3]Media[/SIZE][/COLOR]
[IMG]https://i.gyazo.com/1f89c9d6df59e751038e8b9e0883cab4.png[/img] [IMG]https://i.gyazo.com/60ca60a1ad3b91f80a858c1f61acae28.png[/img] [IMG]https://i.gyazo.com/f7acba411908e61c583b1d5aaf164703.png[/img] [IMG]https://i.gyazo.com/aa75ebcfa1ff52de66135fa1222f83e6.png[/img] [IMG]https://i.gyazo.com/97ee556795d546f6301110f2856e7b9d.png[/img] [IMG]https://i.gyazo.com/761e09f1ec23a867c8892d26fa06c45c.png[/img] [IMG]https://i.gyazo.com/517a50eb5f9f90209e34d308bde411a2.png[/img] [IMG]https://i.gyazo.com/e650a9c221af1e0bc48af59899360ae8.png[/img] [IMG]https://i.gyazo.com/698f251e7dfd85fdc81aa90e5dfd5f7d.png[/img] [IMG]https://i.gyazo.com/d79391717062bdd5bab31b33e5d13275.png[/img] [IMG]https://i.gyazo.com/f7d811d24b306c38c6120600ce4e902e.png[/img] [IMG]https://i.gyazo.com/4d9b291b5382f9cc23da44558daa4558.png[/img] [IMG]https://i.gyazo.com/160b235fea0f0d70a85a80ff6f902d4e.png[/img] [IMG]https://i.gyazo.com/c46d83252bb94a2a102e8a74c45806dc.png[/img] [IMG]https://i.gyazo.com/453179cda60d9a2911fdd474820df9f3.png[/img] [IMG]https://i.gyazo.com/2943e4f6746777356c52f66c948707fe.png[/img] [IMG]https://i.gyazo.com/09bbb46cfe9b7fa259e4531a5050346c.gif[/img]
